title: Interacting with a local Node - ErgoDocs
summary: Among other things, the Appkit library allows us to communicate with Ergo nodes via the REST API. Let's see how we can write ErgoTool - a simple Java console application (similar to ergo-tool utility) which uses Appkit library. ErgoTool allows to create and send a new transaction to any existing Ergo node on the network which. A new node can also be started locally and thus available at http://localhost:9052/.
